nodes.text:
function fromSecp256k1<Account.fromSecp256k1.Options>(privateKey: Hex, options?: Account.fromSecp256k1.Options | undefined): Account.RootAccount
namespace fromSecp256k1
nodes.docs: Instantiates an Account from a Secp256k1 private key.
tags:
```ts
import { Account } from 'viem/tempo'

const account = Account.fromSecp256k1('0x...')
```

nodes.docs:
Generates an ECDSA P256 key pair that includes:

- a `privateKey` of type [`CryptoKey`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/CryptoKey)

- a `publicKey` of type 
{@link 
ox#Hex .Hex
}
 or 
{@link 
ox#Bytes .Bytes
}
tags: options - Options for creating the key pair.

nodes.docs: Instantiates an Account from a P256 private key.
